title: Connectable
text: You can pick up your favorite framework (vue, angular, ember) or template engine (react, preact, hyperhtml).

title: Usable
text: The Merkur widget works with multi page application with jQuery, single page application or isomorphic application.

title: Allow SSR
text: The website load time is critical part for your users. The Merkur use by default server side rendering.

title: Extensible
text: All base functions of widget is defined as plugin too. You can easy add your own plugin.

title: Configurable
text: You have got control over Babel, Webpack, server, etc.

title: Tiny
text: The Merkur has got less than 1 KB minified + gzipped size.
